mapper.select: SELECT cc.comment_id AS commentId, cc.board_id AS boardId, cc.member_id AS memberId, m.nickname AS nickname, cc.content AS content, cc.regdate AS regdate, cc.like_count AS likeCount, cc.editdate AS editdate, cc.parent_comment_id AS parentCommentId FROM community_comment cc JOIN member m ON cc.member_id = m.member_id WHERE cc.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY cc.regdate ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT community_comment_seq.NEXTVAL FROM dual
INSERT INTO community_comment (comment_id, board_id, member_id, nickname, content, regdate) VALUES (#{commentId}, #{boardId},#{memberId}, #{nickname}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE community_comment SET content = #{content}, editdate = SYSDATE WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
